Document summary: This document is a Purchase Power Agreement (PPA) between Kauai Island Utility Cooperative and Kapaa Solar LLC. The agreement details the purchase and sale of energy, terms for billing and payment, indemnification clauses, insurance requirements, conditions precedent for termination, and other standard clauses for a solar energy project. It also covers environmental credits, tax waivers, and dispute resolution procedures, tailored for a solar M&A analyst.
